Description: Clay tablet; complete; lawsuit over a real estate sale; Old Babylonian.
Curator's comments: The case for this object is 1891,0509.2177.A (BM.92640).
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.281)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
